name: anteverted
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(of a body part) sloping forwards: An anteverted uterus is considered to be normal, occurring in 75% of women. Of the 195 hips operated on, 53% of the hip sockets were anteverted, 42% retroverted, and 5% had neutral orientations. Related word
anteversionCompare
retroverted
More examplesFewer examplesBecause of maxillary hypoplasia the nose is short and upturning, with anteverted nostrils.At age 3 the child had mild facial dysmorphism — anteverted ears.After the first trimester the uterus assumes a forward position as an anteverted or "normal" uterus.In most females, the uterus lies in an anteverted position.
